idea:
Guitar Bro is the quickest way to learn guitar. 

Quick Explainer Video - www.tinyurl.com/guitarbro


Brief

Need in the market - 

Almost everyone has pictured themselves playing guitar. Unfortunately, it remains another never-started new year resolution. Simply because it's too much effort - finding a good guitar teacher, managing class schedule, traveling to classes and that too on the weekend. Moreover, it takes around 3 months before you can start your first song.

Existing Solution - 

The current methodology of teaching guitar is very slow and boring. For the first 3 months, there is no-output to be seen for the learner. The feeling of playing songs starts only after that. This test the patience and 70% of people leave learning guitar before reaching this point. 


Online courses have tried to solve this problem but all they have done is, delivered the same teachings in a digital medium. This way, although convenient for many users as they can follow it at-home, is still the same in term of teaching methodology. They still don’t develop the motivation to keep on going. 


Our Solution - 

With Guitar Bro, we have to change the method of learning completely using 3 components. 

1. Video Lectures for an explanation

2. Instruction book with 30+ songs. 

3. Our Patent pending hardware tool for learning. + 31-day work plan

These components work similar to how “training wheels” works for a bicycle. And as a kid can start riding the bicycle on Day- 1 using training wheel, a learner can start playing songs on guitar on Day-1 using our tool. ￼


CURRENT TRACTION

Pilot Launch (3months) - September 2018 - November 2018

Formally Launched - December 2018. 

Total Revenue - 7.5 Lac INR


FUTURE PLAN

Tapping on a huge potential of Indian Market with aspiring generation to develop the skill set in Music, GuitarBro aims at revolutionizing the way music is taught using technology.
name: Guitar Bro

idea: Together for Her is a maternal health platform that enables expecting women to have a high quality & affordable pregnancy. With the ambition to reduce maternal morbidity and mortality, Together aims to help mothers in making informed choices during their pregnancy, bring women together in online communities to support one another, find the right hospital and enables access to affordable healthcare services. After delivery, women share feedback on specific Quality of Care indicators. This feedback is shared with the care provider and a public website. Our studies have shown that this improves quality of care at maternity hospitals.
name: Together for Her

idea: The idea of V-Cloakroom caters to a genuine gap wherein it becomes quite challenging for a person to manage luggage if he/she happens to be either a frequent traveller or plans a long tour in such a way that accommodating luggage becomes inconvenient. “V-Cloakroom” will offer a cost effective luggage handling service through a mobile application or by integrating the plan with the already existing mobile application ecosystem/Website of Indian Railways/Airlines. The purpose is to make the passenger journey by railways/airlines more convenient which will be beneficial in enhancing the travel experience in a cost effective way and in turn would lead to extra revenues for Indian Railways and all the Airlines without much expenses.
name: V-Cloakroom
